name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3: Athena Sword
name_original: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3: Athena Sword
description:
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3: Athena Sword is an action-shooter game developed by Ubisoft Milan. It was originally released in 2004. Ubisoft Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3: Athena Sword on PC.
It was scored by Bill Brown.
